casename: Ngee Ann Development Pte Ltd v Nova Leisure Pte Ltd
counsel: AndrewYeo and Desmond Ho (Allen & Gledhill) for the plaintiff; Quek Mong Hua and Daphne Lim (Lee & Lee) for the defendant
tags: Landlord and Tenant/Rent and service charges
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Rules of construction/Importance of a plain reading of written text/Context of written text as an aid to interpretation.
Landlord and Tenant/Rent and service charges/Contracting parties must expressly provide for the payment of a compensation sum in the event of a surrender.
Restitution/Unjust enrichment/No unjust enrichment where there has not been a breach of the lease.
